# Match Organizer - Ionic Angular Project

## Project Overview
Mobile Hybrid-App (PWA + Android) for organizing matches with Ionic Framework and Capacitor.

## Tech Stack
- Ionic Framework with Angular
- Capacitor for native features
- Supabase for backend/database
- TypeScript

## Project Requirements
- ✅ Ionic Framework with Capacitor plugins
- ✅ Minimum 4 views (pages/tabs)
- ✅ Supabase integration with CRUD operations
- ✅ 3+ device interfaces (camera, geolocation, notifications, offline storage)
- ✅ Custom theming with app name, icon, splashscreen
- ✅ Manual dark mode toggle

## Project Status
Project setup in progress.
